text: I had a membership years ago but I had to cancel it due to financial situation at the time. I was hesitant to sign up again as the closest one to where I live now is 45 mins away. I couldn't resist with the Groupon discount offer and would recommend it to anyone else thinking about signing up for a Sam's Club membership. The money saved more than covers the cost of the membership.

Preorder of food for pickup, left a little to be desired. They didn't have their act together - other than that - FANTASTIC!

name: JC
text: Great place for bulk shopping

name: Christine

name: P

text: Although NO ONE knew what to do about giving me my free perks (Cheesecake, Fruit Tray, and $20 eGift card), they honored them and kindly guided me through the process of setting up a new membership. I have really enjoyed visiting the store and shopping for great deals!

name: Mary
text: Less hassle than Costco, I can scan my items, pay and go. Love it!

name: Shirle
text: I gave them "4" stars as it was really difficult to get your free items. I had to end up going to customer service & they said that you only had "30 days" to get your "free items", which was not explained in the groupon paperwork. The customer service was great. The reason I didn't give "5" stars was the quality/freshness of the free fruit tray. The fruit was old and not many to choose from.

name: Heather
text: Ot did not work because I had problems figuring out how to get redeem code when at Sam’s customer service. Representative ended up giving me a discounted membership at Sam’s and $10 gift card to make up for the confusion.

name: Tony
text: They have no idea that people buy a membership from Groupon for Sam’s Club they were clueless trying to get the free gifts and $20 credit from Groupon when you purchased Sam’s Club membership

name: Jennifer
text: The membership was a great value considering all the freebies I received.

name: Paula
text: Always like Sam's Club .. sometimes what you want isn't in stock but that happens at all stores

name: Lauren
text: Clean and well organized location. Friendly staff, at least the ones I talked with. A very large selection of merchandise.

name: Danielle
text: Zero stars..Terrible! I tried to redeem at Sam's club and lady didn't not know what she was doing clicked on redeem my voucher and lost my verification code. I was unable get my Sam's club membership. Biggest waste of money!!

name: Vanessa
text: My first encounter with a Sam's club employee was very helpful (exit door). 2nd encounter was with an employee at the service desk (she was not helpful and rude). 3rd encounter was with a food sampler where I asked about price on another product. She explained the cost was and how certain foods tasted.

name: Debi
text: I love the great deals that I find at Sam’s Club!! I love to save money and they help me do just that!!

name: Jackie
text: Horrible. Sam's Club employees had no one that knew how to process Groupon membership. 3x. I was asked for $45.00 for my membership. She also told me Groupon would give me the $20.00 ecard which I have not received and don't really know how or when I will receive it. This process took about 35 to 45 minutes. I don't have that extra time to do this and still confused about ecard.

name: Larry
text: Both the mail delivery and the in store pickup was good, the order had to be split, the drive was far but the pick up was good

name: Rebecca
text: I had trouble getting my $10 e-gift card so I went to the customer service counter and they couldn't figure it out so they gave me a $10 gift card right then. They made sure I was happy before I left there. That's the way places should run. Thank you Sam's club.

name: Tammy
text: I went to the Green Bay WI location to redeem and they told me they could not do it there. They said I had to click redeem and I would get an email with an activation code. I clicked mark as redeemed and lost the voucher code the people at the counter said was not the right code. So it says the voucher has been redeemed and I do not have a Sam's Club membership.

name: Karen

Other than that, check out is quick and as far as quality of the products absolutely no complaints!

name: Nell
text: I was a business assoc member and my daughter changed jobs, so I had to buy my own. All I really need it for is my Mom's nutrition drink that only Sam's Club has in boxes of 24. Costco is better but they are many miles from here. And, I hope I do not have to renew this next year as Mom is 98!

I prefer the other wholesale club in town and after a year will go back to them.

text: To long waiting at CHECK OUT. I just do buy enough "bulk" items during year to save some after membership. Must watch for expire items. It just doesn't feel the same as 10 years ago. Now a more competitive market. As Sam's Club has remained the same. As noted by Stores closing.

On the third attempt I realized that they were upper case i's. When I finally was successful, I was relieved to have achieved success. Now we'll see how it goes when I try to redeem or activate the $10 e-gift card.

text: I was able to use my new Sam's Club membership with just my phone. FANTASTIC!! I have so many cards -- credit cards, rewards cards, membership cards . . . yikes! I got there about 20 minutes before the store was closing, so I didn't really finish my shopping. Would have spent a lot more money, so it was a blessing in disguise. Lolol.

Thank you Sam's Club!

So far shopping experience has been good.

There was no one else in line, which was probably a good thing because of her attitude. Otherwise, it was well stocked and clean.

The customer service members weren't able to help me sort it out. I am glad I bought the membership overall and look forward to using it. I especially plan on buying flowers there when I help out with weddings.

name: Callie

text: The service associate was very nice and helpful!

name: Donna
text: I did like some of the prices on items available there but the selection was not as good as I expected. Also a lot of the prices were not as competitive as at other grocery/discount stores. Some of the products available are less expensive online. The food savings are nice but not as inexpensive as I had expected them to be.

name: Karmen
text: My first time experience with Sam's Club was awesome! The sales clerks were nice and informative. name: Alisakt
text: They're in a convenient location and offer the household basics at great prices. They have a wider variety of produce than most of my local grocery stores and everything made in-house is fresh and of good quality. Lowest prices for coffee beans I've found in Denver!

name: Florine
text: It is an adventure shopping at Sam's as it has such a diversity of items, not only groceries! For handicapped persons, the electric seated carts are easy to operate and pivot on a dime!

name: Jessica
text: Very easy to redeem and so cheap. Yeah Costco is better sampling and quality wise but SAMs club doesn't have huge lines and they do have amazing deals too and for $25/year it's worth it.

name: Leticia
text: Nice and clean all the cashiers are very friendly. Can always find what you are looking for.

name: Brad
text: Sam's club is great. didn't receive free chicken voucher through Groupon.

name: Kathy
text: My issue was the redemption of the Groupon. They did not follow through with a confirmation email, e-gift care or the rotisserie chicken. After approaching customer service twice they gave us the e-gift card and chicken (after asking to see my email account to verify that I didn't receive the e-gift card). If the company is going to sponsor this type of promotion they should make sure that the stores have instructions to do it.

name: Michelle
text: The groupon was not very easy to redeem. It was very difficult to redeem the free item as there was not a coupon given and you had to access them on your phone

name: Yvette
text: Terrible. Would not redeem the Groupon and didn't know how to apply

name: Wendy
text: Appreciate the discount offered for membership and typically shop at Sam's Club monthly.

name: Grace
text: They believe in keeping the customer happy.

name: Benjamin
text: I save money here. I upgraded to Plus mainly for the pharmacy discounts. Not everything is cheaper or at least not enough so to make we want to buy 15-50 at a time

name: Maria
text: I didn't receive the deal I paid for. I contacted both Groupon and Sam's Club and neither was willing to help. I paid for "Plus" membership and the deal also included $5 e-gift card and a rottiserie chicken. I received regular membership, no gift card, no chicken.

name: Lori
text: Brand new store with some growing pains

name: Kathy
text: friendly employees, clean, good prices.

text: I never redeemed it. and sam's club denied to give me value back. And while looking at the groupon app, she accidentally hit it as redeemed. Once the groupon is expired it's not possible to get value from merchandise..

text: They couldn't find the coupon code for the Groupon. It took forever at Customer Service while an impatient line of people formed behind me. They never could find the $20 gift certificate that was supposed to accompany the order and I told them to forget it. Last year when I bought the first membership they couldn't find the coupon for the free chicken and I never received that. Won't be renewing here again.

text: Great place for bulk shopping, and finding deals you didn't even know you needed. They have been a huge help for my upcoming wedding and needing to buy in vast quantities. Also plan to deal with extremely rude staff. I've been to a few other SAMs in Atlanta, and this was THE worst.

text: I was really considering Costco. When I saw the Groupon and after talking to a friend who has a Sam's Club card, I decided to give it a try!

name: Kristina
text: I was BJ's club member for many years. Desided to try something different. What a mistake! Absoluteli disapointed.Pure selection in comparison. Prises are not lower as promissed . Store looks empty. No customers. You can see few people walking around....No buyers with fully loadef carts. Meat section not for single person. Huge portions. Sorry, but it's a way I feel. Wouldn't recommend. Do not see any advantage in changing club.

name: Debbie
text: Friendly employees. Willing to help when asked a question about an item or directing you to the right aisle or section of the store. The food court was so cheap that we had lunch there. Could not believe I was able to get a 32oz soda with a jumbo hot dog n free toppings for only $1.50 plus tax which was there combo meal. The rest of the time was spent on loo...

name: Amy
text: I definitely would not have gone to Sam's club had it not been for the groupon coupons and giftcard.

name: Lisa
text: They don't take Visa! Really! What a blow when I went to check out and got the news. I didn't have a MasterCard with me but fortunately my husband had a debit card with him to pay.

name: Mark
text: I was a member a long time ago, but the Groupon offer motivated me to rejoin at this time! A great placement for an exceptional deal!

name: Mariela
text: It was very easy and they had the coupons for free items there and did not have to get it mailed.

name: Natalia
text: It was a great deal! Too bad it's only for NEW customers, although i was by the time i bought the groupon, I already know I want to get it again once it expires.

name: Amelia
text: I am satisfied I got the membership

name: Francine
text: I love Sam's Club!!

name: Sandra
text: The person who processed my groupon was wonderful! It all was done in a timely manner, and very efficiently. The store was clean and well organized. The only thing I didn't like was that I had to spend the $20 gift coupon the same day.

name: Nancy
text: I cant wait to get my card in the mail so I can gi shopping there

name: MIKHAIL
text: The voucher was not taken. I was told to come back after November 13th.

name: Mary
text: love to see what I have missed ty

name: Dan
text: Great deal!! Freebies pay for whole membership. Stores are very clean and there are many items not found at Costco. (We have both now).

name: Liula
text: sams club is great, but because we are a small family, we dont really do our groceries there as we dont need big quantities and we dont have storage space. We will be going to Sams club when it is to buy our christmas presents and unique things that they have with great price

text: sams club is great, but because we are a small family, we dont really do our groceries there as we dont need big quantities and we dont have storage space. We will be going to Sams club when it is to buy our christmas presents and unique things that they have with great price

name: Jeffrey
text: were bj's members previously, wanted to try sam's. would like to see more organic options at sam's. manyother thing similar

name: Susan
text: Love this store! Always find great deals at SAMs and the people are very friendly.

name: Michael
text: The deal was great. With the food vouchers and gift card, it is basically a free membership.

name: Pedro
text: Job we'll done Sam beautiful people

name: Teresa
text: Bought this for my son

name: Deborah
text: I went to Sam's club to redeem my coupon and was told after we hit redeem it was not valid until Nov 13 on the groupon. Come back then. I'm afraid since it shows redeemed they will not honor it even though I have not used it. If this happens how do I get the groupon back that I paid $45

name: Loni
text: Great customer service at Sam's in Mankato, Mn.

name: Andre
text: I love it

name: Alice
text: It took over 30 mins to get me my membership and no one knew what was going on or how to redeem my groupon. Bad experience. If I didn't already buy the groupon I would have left without a membership. Manager was called to the front during my experience. I thought he was going to compensate me for my wasted time. Instead he left before the woman at the front ...

name: Yuriy
text: Prise at store for membership is same $45.

name: Beth
text: Thank you to Rick he helped me when i was unable to use my membership i didnt print it out. He turned a negative into a positive.

name: Margaret
text: I am curious as to why the Groupon is effective on the date of purchase (11/05/13) but the service doesn't begin until 11/13/13.

name: Jenni
text: The membership staff could have been more friendly. I was interested in possibly upgrading to a plus membership for my business and they didn't explain any of the benefits to me.

name: Lisa
text: Took me an hour to get a card at their service desk. Even though the lady worked there 25 years, it took her that long to process my already paid for card. they had 8 computers, but only one could take my picture. They couldn't find the vouchers, a manager had to come unlock something with a password, then couldn't find the gift cards, then they were in an a...

name: Melanie
text: The ladies at the customer desk were very helpful. Considering we had yet to purchace the groupon cupon and that the groupon wasn't good until a later date. Instead of telling us no they worked to ensure we did not have to come back more then a week later to redeem the coupon. It is because these ladies were so friendly and helpful that my husband and I will...

name: Carole
text: I love Sams Club & I am glad I had the money when they offered this promotion!!!

name: Vinnette
text: it took the employees a little time to figure out the Groupon had no knowledge of it..overall it worked out..

name: Katrina
text: Good customer service

text: I cant redeem the groupon till Nov. 13th , looking forward to enjoying it.
